mapper.sql: id , username , nickname , pwd , email , gender , status , regdate , updatedate , deletedate , profile , profile_open , grade
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS VALUES (#{id},#{username},#{nickname},#{pwd},#{email},#{gender},NVL(#{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '가입'),sysdate,sysdate,sysdate,#{profile},#{profile_open},NVL(#{grade, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '1'))
mapper.select: SELECT email FROM users WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT id FROM users WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT pwd FROM users WHERE id = #{id} AND email = #{email}
